isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLES: SPICER J400-S, W460-S - REMOVE

step1.para: Drain lubricant from axle housing and power divider. To drain power divider, remove plugs from bottom of inter-axle differential cover and bottom of power divider intermediate case.
Disconnect power divider control air line.
Disconnect drive shafts from input and output shaft end yokes.
Remove output shaft bearing retainer bolts. Use a soft hammer to loosen bearing retainer from axle housing. Remove bearing cage and output shaft from axle housing.
Loosen differential carrier-to-axle housing bolts. Remove all bolts except top two. These two bolts will prevent carrier assembly from falling.
Support carrier assembly on roller jack. Secure as necessary to prevent carrier from falling from jack when removed from housing.

Install two 1/2 inch-13 bolts into threaded holes provided in carrier housing flange. Turn puller bolts in to break carrier away from housing. Be certain carrier is balanced properly on jack, and remove top two carrier mounting bolts. Remove carrier assembly from axle housing.
Roll carrier assembly from under truck.
Mount carrier assembly in suitable rebuild stand ( Figure 7).

figure.caption: Figure 7. Mount Carrier Assembly in Suitable Rebuild Stand
